problem_names: lemma term_ok'_decr: "term_ok' \<Sigma> t \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> (decr i t)"
lemma eta_preserves_term_ok': "term_ok' \<Sigma> r \<Longrightarrow> r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s"
lemma eta_preserves_term_ok: "term_ok \<Theta> r \<Longrightarrow> r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s"
lemma eta_star_preserves_term_ok': "r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> r  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s"
translations: lemma term_ok'_decr: "term_ok' \<Sigma> t \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> (decr i t)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok' \<Sigma> t \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> (decr i t)
by (induction i t rule: decr.induct) auto
lemma eta_preserves_term_ok': "term_ok' \<Sigma> r \<Longrightarrow> r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
proof (induction r arbitrary: s)
case (Ct n T)

proof (state)
this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Ct n T)
  Ct n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1 x2 s.
       \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> (Ct x1 x2);
        Ct x1 x2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
 2. \<And>x1 x2 s.
       \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> (Fv x1 x2);
        Fv x1 x2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
 3. \<And>x s.
       \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> (Bv x);
        Bv x \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
 4. \<And>x1 r s.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>s.
                   \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r;
                    r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        term_ok' \<Sigma> (Abs x1 r);
        Abs x1 r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
 5. \<And>r1 r2 s.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>s.
                   \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r1;
                    r1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        \<And>s.
           \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r2;
            r2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        term_ok' \<Sigma> (r1 $ r2);
        r1 $ r2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Ct n T)
  Ct n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Ct n T)
  Ct n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok' \<Sigma> s
apply (simp add: tinstT_def split: option.splits)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2.
       \<lbrakk>Ct n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s;
        const_type \<Sigma> n = Some x2;
        typ_ok_sig \<Sigma> T \<and>
        (\<exists>\<rho>. tsubstT x2 \<rho> = T)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
(* Seems like I miss a simp rule for Ct*)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2.
       \<lbrakk>Ct n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s;
        const_type \<Sigma> n = Some x2;
        typ_ok_sig \<Sigma> T \<and>
        (\<exists>\<rho>. tsubstT x2 \<rho> = T)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
using eta_reducible.simps(12) eta_step_imp_eta_reducible

proof (prove)
using this:
  eta_reducible (Ct ?v ?va) = False
  ?t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?t' \<Longrightarrow> eta_reducible ?t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x2.
       \<lbrakk>Ct n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s;
        const_type \<Sigma> n = Some x2;
        typ_ok_sig \<Sigma> T \<and>
        (\<exists>\<rho>. tsubstT x2 \<rho> = T)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
by blast
next
case (Fv n T)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Fv n T)
  Fv n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Fv n T)
  Fv n T \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok' \<Sigma> s
using eta.cases
by blast
next
case (Bv n)
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Bv n)
  Bv n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Bv n)
  Bv n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok' \<Sigma> s
by auto
next
case (Abs R r)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Abs R r)
  Abs R r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1 r s.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>s.
                   \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r;
                    r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        term_ok' \<Sigma> (Abs x1 r);
        Abs x1 r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
 2. \<And>r1 r2 s.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>s.
                   \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r1;
                    r1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        \<And>s.
           \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r2;
            r2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        term_ok' \<Sigma> (r1 $ r2);
        r1 $ r2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Abs R r)
  Abs R r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (Abs R r)
  Abs R r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok' \<Sigma> s
using eta.cases
by (fastforce simp add: term_ok'_decr)
next
case (App f u)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> f; f \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> u; u \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (f $ u)
  f $ u \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>r1 r2 s.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>s.
                   \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r1;
                    r1 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        \<And>s.
           \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> r2;
            r2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s;
        term_ok' \<Sigma> (r1 $ r2);
        r1 $ r2 \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> f; f \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> u; u \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (f $ u)
  f $ u \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> f; f \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' \<Sigma> u; u \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> ?s
  term_ok' \<Sigma> (f $ u)
  f $ u \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok' \<Sigma> s
apply -
apply (erule eta_cases(2))
using term_ok'.simps(4)
by blast+

proof (state)
this:
  term_ok' \<Sigma> s

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma eta_preserves_term_ok: "term_ok \<Theta> r \<Longrightarrow> r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok \<Theta> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok \<Theta> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s
assume a1: "term_ok \<Theta> r"

proof (state)
this:
  term_ok \<Theta> r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok \<Theta> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s
assume a2: "r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s"

proof (state)
this:
  r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok \<Theta> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
have "None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s
using a1 eta_preserves_typ_of1 option.collapse wt_term_def typ_of_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
  term_ok \<Theta> r
  \<lbrakk>?t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?t';
   typ_of1 ?Ts ?t = Some ?\<tau>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> typ_of1 ?Ts ?t' = Some ?\<tau>
  ?option \<noteq> None \<Longrightarrow> Some (the ?option) = ?option
  wt_term ?\<Sigma> ?t \<equiv>
  wf_term ?\<Sigma> ?t \<and> (\<exists>T. \<turnstile>\<^sub>\<tau> ?t : T)
  typ_of ?t \<equiv> typ_of1 [] ?t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok \<Theta> r; r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok \<Theta> s
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok \<Theta> s
using a2 a1 eta_preserves_term_ok' wt_term_def typ_of_def wf_term_iff_term_ok' term_ok_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  None \<noteq> typ_of1 [] s
  r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> s
  term_ok \<Theta> r
  \<lbrakk>term_ok' ?\<Sigma> ?r; ?r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' ?\<Sigma> ?s
  wt_term ?\<Sigma> ?t \<equiv>
  wf_term ?\<Sigma> ?t \<and> (\<exists>T. \<turnstile>\<^sub>\<tau> ?t : T)
  typ_of ?t \<equiv> typ_of1 [] ?t
  wf_term ?\<Sigma> ?t = term_ok' ?\<Sigma> ?t
  term_ok ?\<Theta> ?t \<equiv> wt_term (sig ?\<Theta>) ?t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. term_ok \<Theta> s
by (meson eta_preserves_typ_of has_typ_iff_typ_of)

proof (state)
this:
  term_ok \<Theta> s

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma eta_star_preserves_term_ok': "r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> r  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* s;
     term_ok' \<Sigma> r\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' \<Sigma> s
by (induction rule: rtranclp.induct) (auto simp add: eta_preserves_term_ok')
corollary eta_star_preserves_term_ok: "r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* s \<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy r  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* s; term_ok thy r\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy s
using eta_star_preserves_term_ok' eta_star_preserves_typ_of1 wt_term_def typ_of_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* ?s;
   term_ok' ?\<Sigma> ?r\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok' ?\<Sigma> ?s
  \<lbrakk>?r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* ?s;
   typ_of1 ?Ts ?r = Some ?T\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> typ_of1 ?Ts ?s = Some ?T
  wt_term ?\<Sigma> ?t \<equiv>
  wf_term ?\<Sigma> ?t \<and> (\<exists>T. \<turnstile>\<^sub>\<tau> ?t : T)
  typ_of ?t \<equiv> typ_of1 [] ?t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* s; term_ok thy r\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy s
by auto
corollary term_ok_eta_norm: "term_ok thy t \<Longrightarrow> eta_norm t = t'\<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy t'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok thy t; eta_norm t = t'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy t'
using eta_norm_imp_eta_reds eta_star_preserves_term_ok

proof (prove)
using this:
  eta_norm ?t = ?t' \<Longrightarrow>
  ?t \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* ?t'
  \<lbrakk>?r \<rightarrow>\<^sub>\<eta>\<^sup>* ?s;
   term_ok ?thy ?r\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> term_ok ?thy ?s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>term_ok thy t; eta_norm t = t'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> term_ok thy t'
by blast
end
